body.name: Swiss Ortho Sleep, 12" Inch Certified Independently & Individually Wrapped Pocketed Encased Coil Pocket Spring Contour Mattress - Full, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 37 mins
features: General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding.

Phenomenal High-Quality 10-Inch Certified Independently & Individually Wrapped Pocketed Encased Coil Pocket Spring Contour Mattress. This Mattress is Temperature Sensitive, Body Forming Super Long Lasting High Quality & Extremely Durable.

Each Seperate Pocketed Coil is Individually & Independantly Wrapped to Provide a Support System for an Individualized Comfort by Contouring Precisely to Each Person's Body Perfectly. It Also Doesn't Transfer Motion, for a Peaceful Undisturbed Sleep.

Our Signature Motion Isolation Pocketed Encased Coil Mattress is Made for Uptimum Deep Comforting Pressure Relief Sleep. By Relieving The Pressure Points, Pocket Coil Mattresses Allow Blood & Much Needed Oxygen to Circulate & Flow More Efficiently.
This Mattress Also Contains a Bamboo Cover Which Allows Breathability all throughout. It is Delivered to you in an Easy and Convenient Compressed Packing. Mattress in a box.
body.description: The Better Mattress Company, is proud to introduce the all new Swiss Ortho Sleep mattress in 4 sizes, twin, full, queen, & king. More sensitive to pressure and temperature. A high quality pocket spring mattress that adapts better to the shape of an individual's body. Swiss Ortho Sleep is our best individually encased coil Mattress in ultimate quality & comfort yet. Made from 13 guage springs for extra long lasting use. It features a phenomenal high-quality pocket spring mattress. Temperature sensitive, body forming, super heavy and high-density mattress with the best breathable cover for an excellent night's sleep. Made to fit all body types and weights. We rigorously test for comfort and for long lasting density. The 13 inch guage coils and comfort foam act as an ultra combination of selected layers for comfort that eliminates pressure points, and tossing & turning at night by contouring to the body. Swiss Ortho Sleep bestselling mattress ensures our bodies are supported by the semi firm coils to ensure long lasting use. Made from superior materials in the market and it always comes with a 10 year .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent from the start!!!
reviews.reviewText: My bedroom’s ordinary size & my old mattress is still on the floor beside my bed, so I’m not sure how well these pictures show. But a few things to say. I received this at 12:15-ish in the afternoon, this afternoon of writing. It’s now nearing 3pm by a few minutes. A close friend of mine, set it up alone in about an hour, having to rest for long minutes at a time in between. I think the worst part is that it’s a hugely heavy mattress. It sure is. Unmovable for anyone or ordinary or weak strength alone.It simply unraveled out of the over-outer plastic covering and then we cut off the inner layer plastic, all while it was on the steel platform bed. It began expanding as soon as it was out of the first outer plastic so we had to get it out immediately of the second binding to finish expanding.This full expansion was taken at just 1 hour & 20 minutes about but it basically had nearly full expansion after 3 minutes. Amazing! In an hour & 20 minutes though — I bought a 12” very firm queen — it got a lot tougher in quality of fullness over the top. It is presently growing just over 10” now. I have to double check though, I might have actually only bought the 10”. I’m not sure right now. It doesn’t matter, it seems a fine height to me.The instructions say to leave it alone for 48 hours. I might leave it alone longer. I’m looking forward to trying it during the coming week. It’s a Friday afternoon now.As for odor, I’ve finally had a chance to understand what possibly the awful stories are about in part. There are two medium sized desiccate packets born into the inner locked compression plastic binding the mattresses from unlocking. I had no odor throughout the unpacking, until we unlocked the final plastic and found the two desiccate packets. Then there was some typical odor like that — a chemical picking up the odors if whatever it’s wrapped in. My friend doing the work didn’t smell anything. I sprayed Febreze over it & it also made the Febreze smell like the desiccate, so that’s definitely part of what’s at work with all these odors. It’s a shame, because different mattresses are made with different cloth closing materials & desiccate will give any clothe a chemical odor.But it’s nothing really that needs to be noted except that I wanted to comment on what I’d learned. Right now, the light, lingering faintness of it isn’t going to last past my Febreze spray from an hour ago. Right at this moment anyone walking into my apartment would probably only notice Febreze.So I hope to update this next week after I’ve slept on it, to find how it’s comfort is — should turn out be an excellent firm it seems; very hard to find type besides. And also to relate what size I bought & how large it expanded after so many days of waiting.A year and a half later…. The mattress has been excellently firm over the past time and never really caved anywhere significantly. It’s still firm and very comfortable. This is with regular night to night use in that time. About now only I’m starting to notice that where I sit sometimes propped up with my electronic device working, it’s taking shape of a smaller less firm indent. Only slightly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Bed Ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure this bed was really for me, I thought it was going to be too soft, well the bed proved me wrong, I don't sleep well at night, due to being so uncomfortable. My first night on this bed, was truly Amazing!!! I didn't even realize I had fallen asleep, then I was comfortable, and I slept straight through the night. OMG!! This bed is truly a piece of Heaven. If you have trouble sleeping, or you're uncomfortable, this bed will change your life. The price was Amazing, and the bed will be everything to you. Give it a try, you'll be truly Amazed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This mattress will get you through 5 years of comfortable sleep.
reviews.reviewText: Five years ago, I found myself needing a mattress urgently. I had moved out of an apartment with a built-in bed, so I had nothing to sleep on except for an old twin mattress made out of memory foam. It had a black hole in the middle that slowly leaked Hawking radiation.I had the Swiss Ortho delivered to my workplace, and I took it home in a 2003 Chevy Impala. I let the front seat down and slid the box in at an angle. A small part of it stuck out the passenger window.It opened up exactly as advertised. It was marketed as a mattress that you don't have to flip over, so I rotated it clockwise at regular intervals. It stayed firm and functional for some years.Last year, it was beginning to sink down in the middle, so I decided to finally flip it over before a bunch of astrophysicists showed up to study the gravitational collapse.Flipping it actually helped to make it more comfortable. The bottom of the mattress is of Completely Different material and texture, so it took a night or two to get used to.This approach probably won't work if you have a spouse sleeping next you, unless they're onboard with this attempt to keep the black hole's event horizon at bay for another year.The mattress discolors Very Easily, so I suggest you put a mattress pad between the mattress and your fitted sheet.It is recommended that you change your mattress every eight years anyway, so five good years out of this one has been just fine by me, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is Great! I have been sleeping on it for two wks and its very comfy. I have lower back pain and the medium firmness is perfect. Going to be ordering a full size for my daughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than expected
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy a bed in a box But the price was right and the reviews were pretty good. It was not too hard to remove from the box and wrapping. Its a 100# and large so not super easy to maneuver by yourself but I managed. Once I cut the vac seal it immediately started to open up I say to fully see the expansion it was a good 12 hrs it also firmed up a little from the initial time I slept on it which to me was better. The only thing that I do not like and it might not be able to be fixed since it's sealed in a box are the sides are not as supportive I think I can get used to that
